template<typename T>
T getFromString (  const char *  str  )  throw (PropertyException)
 

Obsolete, use StringConvert::convert instead.

Tries to set specified property from string, throws MC2String with a description of the error on failure. This must be specialized.

Returns:
copy of property

template<typename T>
T getMostSpecializedProperty (  const MC2String &  propertyName,
const MC2String &  modulePrefix,
uint32  mapSet,
T  defaultValue
) 
 

Gets the value for a property by trying different variations of the property name.

This is used so a property file can include for instance properties like "MODULE_MAX_MEM", "MAP_MODULE_MAX_MEM", "MODULE_MAX_MEM_0" etc, where the more specialized names take precedence.

Parameters:
propertyName The base name of the property.
modulePrefix The name of the module, for instance "MAP".
mapSet The map set, is added as a suffix.
defaultValue The default value to use if the property does not exist or is invalid somehow.
Returns:
The value of the most specialized property name.
